ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَٰشِيَةِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Has news of the Overwhelmer reached you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: HAS NEWS OF the Overpowering Event reached you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Has the news of the overwhelming event reached you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have you heard the story of the overwhelming event (the Day of Judgment)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Certainly the news of the calamity that will overwhelm has come to you!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Has there come to you the narration of Al-Ghashiyah (the overwhelming)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Has not there come to you the news of the overwhelming calamity?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Hast thou received the story of the Enveloper?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hath there come unto thee tidings of the Overwhelming?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you heard about the Overwhelming Event?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hath there come Unto thee the story of the Enveloping Event?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did you receive the account of the Enveloper?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Has the story reached thee of the overwhelming (Event)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Has there come to you the narration of the overwhelming (i.e. the Day of Resurrection);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you received the news of the Enveloper?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Has there come to you the news of the overwhelming?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:1] Has there — [there has] indeed — come to you the tiding of the Enveloper?, the Resurrection, [so called] because it ‘envelops’ creatures with its terrors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said concerning the interpretation of Allah's saying (Hath there come unto you): '(Hath there come unto you) He says: it has not come unto you, Muhammad, before but now it has; it is also said that this means: it has come unto you (tidings of the Overwhelming) the news of the coming of the Hour? It is also said the Overwhelming refers to the Fire overwhelming its dwellers.
